title: Alnilam
description: The story of Frank Cahill, blinded during the early days of World War Two, and his relentless search for the son he never knew --- a charismatic Air Force pilot supposedly killed in a mysterious training accident. A bizarre and compelling odyssey that leads Cahill to the secret heart of a "higher military", where heroism and a fanatical devotion to flight combine to lead an elite corps of young airmen to the threshold of the stars --- and beyond!
author: James Dickey
